name: Looking For (ClueGames)
description: In the game “Looking For” you slip into the role of a detective and make your way through a mysterious mansion of your new case. Professor McBain, the renowned historian and art collector, has disappeared without a trace and the police are at a loss. Find hidden clues, solve riddles and get one step closer to unraveling the mystery “Looking for” - Are you able to connect all the dots and discover what happened to the professor?
